mapper.sql: car_id As car_id, type AS type , color AS color, price AS price, deposit AS deposit, carname AS carname, create_time AS create_time, update_time AS update_time, status AS status
mapper.insert: INSET INTO car( type, color, price, deposit, carname, create_time, update_time )VALUES ( #{color}, #{price}, #{deposit}, #{carname}, #{create_time}, #{update_time} )
mapper.select:
select
from car where status = '0' and car_id = #{car_id}
